TopicTitle: How to do a DMP server?

Articles.Content:
I (KSP Bro AE), got our DMP war server up and running. I had KSP Bro KS come over and test it, and it worked. But when he went home, it dodn't work. I also noticed that public servers don't use an IP address, but something like nonamegamer.ts.nonameservers.com, and I don't know how to get that.

Can somebody help us?
